Job Description:
Job Description: : 

Your key role would be to develop ERP Applications and Software Products using Core PHP, MYSQL, AJAX. You would be involved in complete system development life cycle. An exciting opportunity to automate system processes and develop software products. 

Candidate Profile : 

BTech/ BE from reputed university with strong foundation in C, C and database design. 2- 4 years of development experience in Core PHP- MYSQL. Must be passionate to develop applications in PHP/ MY SQL. Must be hard working and quick learner.
